text: Skirt is the lower part of a dress or gown, or an outer garment serving this purpose. Skirt or Skirts may also refer to: ==Arts, entertainment, and media== * "Skirt" (song), a 2013 by Kylie Minogue * Skirts (film), a 1921 American silent comedy film * Skirts (TV series), an Australian television series ==Other uses== * Skirt, the part of a hovercraft that inflates with air allowing the craft to hover * Skirt steak, a cut of beef steak
title: Skirt (disambiguation)
